infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: AccessLink uses your location to find nearby accessible LGBTQ+ businesses and events.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: AccessLink uses your location to find nearby accessible LGBTQ+ businesses and events.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: AccessLink uses the camera to allow businesses to upload photos showcasing their accessibility features.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: AccessLink accesses your photo library to upload accessibility feature photos.

plugins.locationAlwaysAndWhenInUsePermission: Allow AccessLink to use your location to find nearby accessible LGBTQ+ businesses.
